schema-directSQL.statement: insert into eam_resource (id, version_col, resource_type_id, instance_id, cid, subject_id, proto_id, name, sort_name, fsystem) select id - 8000, 0, 601, id, id, 0, 0, name, sort_name, true from eam_platform_type

insert into eam_resource (id, version_col, resource_type_id, instance_id, cid, subject_id, proto_id, name, sort_name, fsystem) select id - 7800, 0, 602, id, id, 0, 0, name, sort_name, true from eam_server_type

insert into eam_resource (id, version_col, resource_type_id, instance_id, cid, subject_id, proto_id, name, sort_name, fsystem) select id - 7000, 0, 603, id, id, 0, 0, name, sort_name, true from eam_service_type

update eam_resource set proto_id = ( select proto.id from eam_platform p join eam_platform_type pt on pt.id = p.platform_type_id join eam_resource proto on proto.resource_type_id = 601 and proto.instance_id = pt.id where p.id = eam_resource.instance_id) where eam_resource.resource_type_id = 301

update eam_resource set proto_id = ( select proto.id from eam_server s join eam_server_type st on st.id = s.server_type_id join eam_resource proto on proto.resource_type_id = 602 and proto.instance_id = st.id where s.id = eam_resource.instance_id) where eam_resource.resource_type_id = 303

update eam_resource set proto_id = ( select proto.id from eam_service s join eam_service_type st on st.id = s.service_type_id join eam_resource proto on proto.resource_type_id = 603 and proto.instance_id = st.id where s.id = eam_resource.instance_id) where eam_resource.resource_type_id = 305

update eam_resource set proto_id = ( select proto.id from eam_application a join eam_application_type at on at.id = a.application_type_id join eam_resource proto on proto.resource_type_id = 604 and proto.instance_id = at.id where a.id = eam_resource.instance_id) where eam_resource.resource_type_id = 308;
CREATE INDEX eam_resource_proto_idx ON eam_resource (proto_id)
ALTER TABLE eam_resource ADD CONSTRAINT fk7ac0e15c8b366a94 FOREIGN KEY (proto_id) REFERENCES eam_resource(id)
